sentences.sentence: All my desired was to aggrandize my estate.
sentences.translation: 我所希望的只是扩充我的家业。

sentences.sentence: All he desired was to aggrandize his estate.
sentences.translation: 他所希望的只是扩充他的家业。

sentences.sentence: We aswell hope to aggrandize our business with you.
sentences.translation: 我们也盼望与贵公司扩展贸易往来。
